news.title: PolicyCheck: the Greens' Harm Reduction Innovation Fund drug policy
news.summary: Welcome to PolicyCheck, a new form of political coverage that aims to make better sense of policies launched by the major parties in the lead up to the 2016 election.

facebook.title: PolicyCheck: the Greens' Harm Reduction Innovation Fund drug policy
facebook.summary:
Let's take a look at The Australian Greens' proposed drug policy, which would invest in new approaches to reducing harms and deaths associated with alcohol and other drug use.

Here, we look at the history of the policy, whether it has been tried in Austra
